item.description:

Nov 27, 09:53 UTC

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - GRA0316A04B
item.description:
Dec 7, 18:20 UTC

An update will be provided as soon as significant progress has been made.

Dec 7, 17:40 UTC

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 03/12/2024 12:25 UTC
Service impact : All of servers in the rack E101B09 are no longer responding.
Root cause: This incident is due to an issue on the cooling system.

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA6][Bare Metal] - Virtual Private Servers incident notification
item.description:
Dec 5, 15:11 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/12/2024 12:52 UTC
End Time : 05/12/2024 14:37 UTC
Service impact : Some Virtual Private Servers in GRA6 were temporarily unavailable due to a storage issue.
Root cause :A storage issue caused the incident
We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Dec 5, 14:43 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 05/12/2024 12:52 UTC
Service impact : Some Virtual Private Servers in GRA6 were temporarily unavailable due to a storage issue.
No more impact is observed since 14:37 UTC.
Root cause : A storage issue caused the incident
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams implemented a fix to solve the issue.
We are currently monitoring the situation.

Dec 5, 13:32 UTC
Update - An incident is in progress on our Virtual Private Servers offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the Availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 05/12/2024 12:52 UTC
Service impact : Some Virtual Private Servers in GRA6 might seem unavailable due to a storage issue.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Dec 5, 13:23 UTC
Investigating - We have detected an issue on our infrastucture. We will update informations when we will have more details.
